parameters.label: Brain Extraction Parameter Set
parameters.description: Brain extraction pipeline parameters. OBS: This method uses FSL 5.0 (BET) toolkit

double.name: valueF
double.label: Fractional Level
double.description: A double value for brain volume estimative (0->1)

double.name: valueG
double.label: Gradient in fractional intensity
double.description: Vertical gradient in fractional intensity threshold (-1->1)

boolean.name: optionB
boolean.description: This attempts to reduce image bias, and residual neck voxels
boolean.label: Bias and Neck removal

string-enumeration.name: interpolationMethod
string-enumeration.label: Interpolation method
string-enumeration.description: Interpolation method to be applied over all image modalities

string-enumeration.name: metricMethod
string-enumeration.label: Metric Method
string-enumeration.description: Metric method to be applied over all image modalities

string-enumeration.name: optimizationMethod
string-enumeration.label: Optimization Method
string-enumeration.description: Optimization method to be applied over all image modalities

parameters.label: T1w Volume Filtering Parameters Set
parameters.description: Image filtering parameters specific for T1w image modality

double.name: condutance
double.label: Condutance
double.description: A integer value for edge preservation adjustment.

integer.name: iterations
integer.label: Number of Iterations
integer.description: A integer value that defines the number of iterations.

double.name: timeStep
double.label: Time Step
double.description: A double value that regulates the numerical stability of the algorithm. It is safe to maintain the upper limit with the formulation given by Anisotropic Diffusion algorithm (See GradientAnisotropiDiffusionImageFilter in ITK documentation).

double.name: q
double.label: Anomalous Parameter
double.description: A double value that defines the q-Gaussian probability distribution function which is convoluated in each neighborhood in the image.
